title: Elegant Ruby and Diamond Pendant Necklace - A Timeless Haaram Design
materials: Ruby Drops. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: Intricate filigree work surrounding the central Ruby, adorned with sparkling diamonds in a pave setting. The pendant features a classic teardrop design, complemented by three delicate Ruby drops. The chain consists of alternating diamond and gold sections, showcasing a modern take on traditional Haaram design. The Ruby center is an emerald cut, while the smaller rubies are pear cut.
colors: Deep Red Rubies. A vibrant and auspicious color palette deeply rooted in South Indian tradition.
occasions: and other special occasions. Also suitable for half-saree functions (Chinnavayasu Utsavam) and contemporary evening wear.
description: This pendant necklace blends traditional South Indian design with modern sensibilities. The high-quality gemstones and meticulous craftsmanship ensure lasting beauty and value. The ruby, considered auspicious, symbolizes love and passion, making it an ideal gift for a loved one. The Hyderabadi polish ensures the gold maintains its brilliant shine for years to come. Versatile design makes it suitable for both traditional and contemporary outfits.
